meanings.definition: Harmful or damaging in a subtle or unexpected way.
meanings.sent1: The deleteriousness effects of the storm were evident in the fallen trees.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the deleteriousness impact of pollution on the environment.
meanings.sent3: The deleteriousness consequences of eating too much candy were evident in his toothache.
meanings.sent4: The deleteriousness influence of negative thoughts can impact one's mental health.
meanings.sent5: The deleteriousness nature of gossip spreads like wildfire in a small town.

meanings.definition: The quality of being harmful or damaging.
meanings.sent1: The deleteriousness of the chemicals in the water was concerning to the residents.
meanings.sent2: She researched the deleteriousness of certain food additives on human health.
meanings.sent3: The deleteriousness of his jokes was that they were never funny.
meanings.sent4: The deleteriousness of procrastination can lead to missed opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The deleteriousness of the gossip mill in the office was affecting team morale.
